title: Web Scraping
description: Scrape web pages for content, extract structured data using CSS selectors, and run batch scraping jobs across multiple URLs
author: Jarvis Inc

commands.name: scrape_page
commands.description: Scrape content from a single web page using CSS selectors

parameters.name: selectors
parameters.description: Named CSS selectors to extract, e.g. { "title": "h1", "prices": ".price-tag", "links": "a.product-link" }

returns.description: Scraped data keyed by selector names, with arrays of matched text content and attributes

commands.name: extract_structured
commands.description: Extract structured data from a page using an AI-inferred schema

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL to extract data from

parameters.name: schema
parameters.description: Desired output schema with field names, types, and descriptions

returns.description: Extracted data conforming to the requested schema, with extraction confidence scores

commands.name: batch_scrape
commands.description: Scrape the same data structure from multiple URLs

parameters.name: selectors
parameters.description: Named CSS selectors to apply to each URL

returns.description: Array of results per URL, each containing scraped data and any errors encountered
